message.content:
Here is a 7-day healthy meal plan that excludes the specified ingredients:

**Monday**

* Breakfast: Oatmeal with Banana and Berries
	+ 1 cup cooked oatmeal
	+ 1 sliced banana
	+ 1/2 cup mixed berries (such as blueberries, strawberries, raspberries)
* Lunch: Grilled Chicken and Veggie Wrap
	+ 1 whole wheat tortilla
	+ 4 oz grilled chicken breast
	+ 1/2 cup shredded lettuce
	+ 1/2 cup sliced cucumber
	+ 1/4 cup sliced bell peppers
* Snack: Apple Slices with Carrot Sticks
	+ 1 medium apple, sliced
	+ 4-5 carrot sticks

**Tuesday**

* Breakfast: Avocado Toast
	+ 2 slices whole wheat bread
	+ Mashed avocado
	+ Salt and pepper to taste
* Lunch: Quinoa Salad Bowl
	+ 1 cup cooked quinoa
	+ 1 cup mixed greens
	+ 1/2 cup sliced grilled chicken breast
	+ 1/4 cup cherry tomatoes, halved
	+ 1/4 cup sliced cucumber
* Snack: Cucumber Slices with Hummus
	+ 1 medium cucumber, sliced
	+ 2 tbsp hummus

**Wednesday**

* Breakfast: Smoothie Bowl
	+ 1 cup frozen berries
	+ 1/2 cup unsweetened almond-free milk (such as coconut milk or oat milk)
	+ 1 tablespoon chia seeds
	+ Top with sliced banana and shredded coconut
* Lunch: Grilled Turkey and Avocado Wrap
	+ 1 whole wheat tortilla
	+ 4 oz grilled turkey breast
	+ 1/2 avocado, sliced
	+ 1 cup mixed greens
* Snack: Rice Cakes with Peanut Butter-Free Spread (such as sunflower seed butter)
	+ 2 rice cakes
	+ 2 tbsp sunflower seed butter

**Thursday**

* Breakfast: Scrambled Eggs and Spinach
	+ 2 scrambled eggs
	+ 1/4 cup fresh spinach leaves
	+ Salt and pepper to taste
* Lunch: Lentil Soup with Whole Wheat Bread
	+ 1 cup cooked lentils
	+ 1 slice whole wheat bread
* Snack: Grapes and Pineapple

**Friday**

* Breakfast: Whole Grain Waffles with Berries and Banana
	+ 1 whole grain waffle
	+ 1/2 cup mixed berries
	+ 1 sliced banana
* Lunch: Chicken Caesar Salad
	+ 4 oz grilled chicken breast
	+ 2 cups mixed greens
	+ 1/4 cup cherry tomatoes, halved
	+ 1 tbsp olive oil and lemon juice dressing
* Snack: Cucumber Slices with Guacamole

**Saturday**

* Breakfast: Overnight Oats
	+ 1 cup rolled oats
	+ 1 cup unsweetened almond-free milk (such as coconut milk or oat milk)
	+ 1 tablespoon chia seeds
	+ Top with sliced banana and shredded coconut
* Lunch: Grilled Chicken and Veggie Kabobs
	+ 4 oz grilled chicken breast
	+ 1 cup mixed veggies (such as bell peppers, onions, zucchini)
* Snack: Rice Cakes with Hummus

**Sunday**

* Breakfast: Avocado Omelette
	+ 2 eggs
	+ 1/4 avocado, diced
	+ Salt and pepper to taste
* Lunch: Turkey and Cheese-Free Wrap (use a dairy-free alternative such as vegan cheese or hummus)
	+ 1 whole wheat tortilla
	+ 4 oz sliced turkey breast
	+ 1 cup mixed greens
	+ 1/4 cup cherry tomatoes, halved

This meal plan excludes all the ingredients you specified and includes a variety of healthy foods to keep you satisfied throughout the day. Remember to stay hydrated by drinking plenty of water throughout the day!
